\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

    % https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
    & A & B & C \\
    {\,} & A & E & \bullet & {\,}
    \arrow["f", from=1-2, to=1-3]
    \arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=2-2]
    \arrow["g", from=1-3, to=1-4]
    \arrow["a", from=2-2, to=2-3]
    \arrow["s", from=2-3, to=1-3]
    \arrow["t", from=2-3, to=2-4]
    \arrow[dashed, from=2-4, to=1-4]
\end{tikzcd}
    \end{document}
